text: 11.23 Mat 17.20, Luk 17.6, 1 Ko 13.2 Yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak. Binɨb dum awl nop agɨnɨgel, Dum ak, nad tɨkjakɨl, ñɨg solwala ayaŋ pɨdeg lan agenɨgel, kɨli God ne gek ñɨg ayaŋ amnɨgab agɨl, agɨnɨgabal tek gɨnɨgab agak. Pen gɨnɨgab akaŋ ma gɨnɨgab agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgabal ak, ma gɨnɨgab agak.
